name: Stopper Agents
description:
The red button is in danger!

The stopper agents are ready to kept it safe. They will push any menace the were able to catch.

One-button control:

- Move mouse to see the jump direction

- Left click to throw an agent

Make sure there are some available agents!

Developed by Dealgo Dev. Studio for Amudev MJAM20

Development Utilities and Resources:

- Game Maker Studio 2 (programming)

- Pixel Studio (pixelart design)

- Procreate (how-to-play graphics)

- PhotoFiltre 7 (text design and graphic management)

- BeepBox (music and fx composition)

- Audacity (sound MP3 conversion)

- Twitter (devlog at @dealgodevstudio )
